name: Tet-Platform-Ris
description:
If you think this is just Tetris, than you would be wrong, This game is the union between Tetris and a Platformer.

To play game you need to master Multitasking becouse with one hand you will move the blocks and with the other one you will move the player. But to survive you need to collect Timers that will refill your time bar, obviously the timer will be all around the board so you are forced to use the Tetrominos as stairs for you to reach the timers in time. And if you thought that this wasn't hard enough, the higher is your score the faster the Tetrominos will fall.

I'm challenging  you to beat my highscore of 2740 if you manage to pull it off than you are officialy a  PRO!

This game was made in 24 Hours and it has been submitted to the Global MoonJam Game Jam
